val:
Boulder Lifestyle always offers fun and unique opportunities to work with the best people in the community and this shoot was no different.

Before even connecting with the riders for the shoot I spent a good bit of time scouting the Marshall Mesa and Dowdy Draw trail systems searching for the best locations for our sunrise gravel shoot.

After meeting with the local rippers at 6am we proceeded to ride the trail stopping to shoot and shooting while riding. The goal of all of these photos was to capture the camaraderie of the group, the beauty of Boulder, and the variety of trails we have in city limits.Â
